cofh.api.tileentity

Interface IPortableData


  • public interface IPortableData
    Implement this interface on Tile Entities which can write a limited amount of data about themselves. This is typically for the purposes of being transferred to a similar tile entity.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      java.lang.String getDataType()
      Data identifier of the Tile Entity/Block.
      void readPortableData(EntityPlayer player, NBTTagCompound tag)
      Read the data from a tag.
      void writePortableData(EntityPlayer player, NBTTagCompound tag)
      Write the data to a tag.

    • Method Detail

      • getDataType

        java.lang.String getDataType()
        Data identifier of the Tile Entity/Block. Used for display as well as verification purposes. Tiles with completely interchangeable data should return the same type.
        Returns:

      • readPortableData

        void readPortableData(EntityPlayer player,
                    NBTTagCompound tag)
        Read the data from a tag. The player object exists because this should always be called via player interaction!

      • writePortableData

        void writePortableData(EntityPlayer player,
                     NBTTagCompound tag)
        Write the data to a tag. The player object exists because this should always be called via player interaction!
